'' then', ' sys.htp.p(''

'');', ' end if;', '', ' sys.htp.p(apex_application.do_substitutions(c1.help_text));', '', ' if substr(trim(c1.help_text), -4) != ''

'' then', ' sys.htp.p(''

'');', ' end if;', ' ', ' end if;', 'end loop;')) ,p_plug_source_type=>'NATIVE_PLSQL' ,p_plug_query_options=>'DERIVED_REPORT_COLUMNS' ); wwv_flow_api.create_page_item( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(3104882908791178) ,p_name=>'P10041_PAGE_ID' ,p_item_sequence=>10 ,p_item_plug_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(3104782376791177) ,p_display_as=>'NATIVE_HIDDEN' ,p_protection_level=>'S' ,p_attribute_01=>'Y' ); wwv_flow_api.component_end; end;
